::Aerotaur::
    "NO!  Well, it seems I don't have a leg to stand on.  (Please save ironic 
smirks.)"  He spots Lynxiz being stabbed before the shots hit him.  Only a 
shot or two hit him because of the poor aim.  They left small holes in his 
chest.  He swoops down lower, still in the air.  He launches another barrage 
at Deemos' back so as to avoid Lynxiz.
